data.actual_result: The error is shown for around one second or less, touching the screen will show the same error again. (NOTE: only works if you have Google Autofill enabled and with an active suggestion on your screen, got confirmation from a Developer this can be reported)
data.expected_result: It pops out an error saying "Unable to open file: Bad activity[...]" for enough time to let you read it.
data.short_description: "Unable to open file" error vanishes too fast. (OS with Google Autofill enabled only)
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to Settings > My account and then click to change your profile picture. - Select an unsupported file format (I used mp4) and observe.
